long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Decide4Me is a quick and easy chrome extension that can roll a dice and give you a number, flip a coin and give you the result, or give you responses of a magic 8ball. Simply install and decide your decisions away!

Credits:
All icons used in this extension were made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com
Author or icons:
